entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:33 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 5:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
